::Darkfate::

The male bot though a second before answer "You can come in our 
territory, where do you want speak? choose the place, but it should 
be in our territory or around..."

While he said that words, he send a secret menssage to Blacknightmare.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Perndabot::
> 
> "I am Perndabot, an Alliance member," the bot responds as he is 
> contacted by Predacons, "Zardus sent me here to discuss a possible 
> peace treaty with your faction."
> 
> 
> 
>

the
